title: More Brain Cuttings- Carl Zimmer [PDF & Epub] [StormRG]
description:
TITLE/EDITION More Brain Cuttings: Further Explorations of the Mind
Author: Carl Zimmer
Print Length: 82 pages
Publisher: Scott & Nix, Inc. (November 1, 2011)
Language: English
ASIN: B006C9OV1W
NOTE: this is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book

____________________________________________________________________________________


This is a good collection of essays that covers a wide range of brain science. As with his previous collection, the stories are all easy to read and understand for anyone with a curiosity in what the brain scientists are finding out nowadays
